data.lyric:
[ti:Nobody But You (Duet with Gwen Stefani)]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani]
[al:Fully Loaded: God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Nobody But You(Duet with Gwen Stefani) - Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani
[00:03.60]Lyrics by：Josh Osborne/Ross Copperman/Shane McAnally/Tommy Lee James
[00:07.20]Don't have to leave this town to see the world
[00:11.53]'Cause it's something that I gotta do
[00:13.92]I don't wanna look back in 30 years
[00:18.35]And wonder who you're married to
[00:20.65]Wanna say it now wanna make it clear
[00:25.01]For only you and God to hear
[00:27.34]When you love someone they say you set 'em free
[00:31.69]But that ain't gonna work for me
[00:34.67]I don't wanna live without you
[00:37.72]I don't wanna even breathe
[00:41.03]I don't wanna dream about you
[00:43.99]Wanna wake up with you next to me
[00:46.76]I don't wanna go down any other road now
[00:50.22]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[00:53.56]Lookin' in your eyes now if I had to die now
[00:56.92]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[00:59.81]You
[01:07.47]All the wasted days all the wasted nights
[01:11.73]I blame it all on being young
[01:14.00]Got no regrets 'cause it got me here
[01:18.08]But I don't wanna waste another one
[01:20.71]I been thinkin' about what I want in my life
[01:24.96]It begins and ends the same
[01:27.40]If I had to choose what I couldn't lose
[01:31.54]There'd only be one thing
[01:34.43]I don't wanna live without you
[01:37.67]I don't wanna even breathe
[01:41.07]I don't wanna dream about you
[01:43.95]Wanna wake up with you next to me
[01:46.89]I don't wanna go down any other road now
[01:50.19]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[01:53.47]Lookin' in your eyes now if I had to die now
[01:56.93]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[01:59.93]You
[02:04.39]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[02:06.88]You
[02:14.00]Wanna say it now wanna make it clear
[02:18.52]For only you and God to hear
[02:22.74]I don't wanna live without you
[02:26.05]I don't wanna even breathe
[02:29.33]I don't wanna dream about you
[02:32.27]Wanna wake up with you next to me
[02:34.52]Next to me
[02:35.28]I don't wanna go down any other road now
[02:38.50]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[02:40.66]I don't wanna love nobody
[02:42.03]Lookin' in your eyes now if I had to die now
[02:45.22]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[02:48.21]You
[02:53.52]I don't wanna love nobody but you
[02:55.28]You
[02:59.51]I don't wanna love nobody but you
data.trans:
[ti:Nobody But You (Duet with Gwen Stefani)]
[ar:Blake Shelton/Gwen Stefani]
[al:Fully Loaded: God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.60]//
[00:07.20]不必离开这个城市去看这大千世界
[00:11.53]因为有一件事我必须做
[00:13.92]我不想三十年后回首过去
[00:18.35]不知道你嫁给了谁
[00:20.65]我想现在就说出来 我想跟你说明白
[00:25.01]只有你和上帝能听到
[00:27.34]他们说 如果你爱一个人 就要给他自由
[00:31.69]但那道理在我这里行不通
[00:34.67]我不想我的生命中没有你
[00:37.72]没有你 我甚至不想呼吸
[00:41.03]我不想每天只能在梦里见到你
[00:43.99]想要醒来就能看到你
[00:46.76]我现在不想去别的地方
[00:50.22]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[00:53.56]看着你的眼睛 就算让我死也愿意
[00:56.92]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[00:59.81]只有你
[01:07.47]荒废了那么多日日夜夜
[01:11.73]我觉得都是因为我们太年轻
[01:14.00]但我心中没有遗憾 毕竟已经走到这一步
[01:18.08]但我不想再浪费时间
[01:20.71]我一直在想 自己这一生想要什么
[01:24.96]答案从头到尾都一样
[01:27.40]如果我必须做出取舍
[01:31.54]那我无法割舍的只有一个人
[01:34.43]我不想我的生命中没有你
[01:37.67]没有你 我甚至不想呼吸
[01:41.07]我不想每天只能在梦里见到你
[01:43.95]想要醒来就能看到你
[01:46.89]我现在不想去别的地方
[01:50.19]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[01:53.47]看着你的眼睛 就算让我死也愿意
[01:56.93]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[01:59.93]只有你
[02:04.39]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[02:06.88]只有你
[02:14.00]我想现在就说出来 我想跟你说明白
[02:18.52]只有你和上帝能听到
[02:22.74]我不想我的生命中没有你
[02:26.05]没有你 我甚至不想呼吸
[02:29.33]我不想每天只能在梦里见到你
[02:32.27]想要醒来就能看到你
[02:34.52]在我身旁
[02:35.28]我现在不想去别的地方
[02:38.50]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[02:40.66]我不想爱别人
[02:42.03]看着你的眼睛 就算让我死也愿意
[02:45.22]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[02:48.21]只有你
[02:53.52]除了你 我谁都不想爱
[02:55.28]只有你
[02:59.51]除了你 我谁都不想爱
